DOC.detailed_description: Women age 18 55 year age Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia 2 3 colposcopy negative EndoCervical Curettage enrol pilot study compare ultrasonic surgical aspiration traditional cervical excision procedure treatment cervical dysplasia . In pilot study , patient serve control group . Prior receive traditional treatment cervical dysplasia consist Cold Knife Conization EndoCervical Curettage , patient 's cervix treat ultrasonic surgical aspiration . The aspirate send pathology result compare finding cervical cone biopsy . The patient follow Liquid-based Cytology pap smear every 4 6 month completion study enrollment/treatment period .
